Package main

Interface UserInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CmdLineUi, GameOverGui, ImprovingAthleteGui, MainScreenGui, MarketGui, SelectOpponentGui, SetupWindowGui, StadiumGui
public interface UserInterface
Interface that is used in CmdLineUi, GameEnvironment.

    • printingFacePhoto

      default ImageIcon printingFacePhoto(Product athlete)
      Get image from Product and process. Defined as default method because there is no image in Class Item.
      Parameters:
      athlete - An athlete needing to return images
      Returns:
      athlete face photo, if athlete is null return null
